text: Then the angel 6:11 Or Angel; also in verses 12, 20, 21, and 22; corresponding pronouns may also be capitalized. of the LORD came and sat down under the oak 6:11 Or terebinth or great tree; also in verse 19 in Ophrah that belonged to Joash the Abiezrite, where his son Gideon was threshing wheat in a winepress to hide it from the Midianites.
